price: 78. (Y Al-lah les dirá:) “Ciertamente, les trajimos la verdad a través del Profeta, pero la mayoría de ustedes la despreciaron”.
arabic: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
